title: XWUICopyButton Schema
description: Schema for XWUICopyButton component - describes both conf_comp (component configuration) and data (component data)

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

textToCopy.description: Text to copy to clipboard when button is clicked

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for copy icon

copiedIcon.description: SVG icon HTML string for copied state icon

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds before reverting to original state

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
